Size:the size L is like a medium Design:basic Material:presko, hindi mainit Fo reference, Im 5'3", 53kgs, 30in waist, 38in hip, usually a size medium. Buti L ang kinuha ko para may konting allowance for movement. Presko ang fabric. The shirts' stitching is my issue; good, but it could be better. Sana naka tuck inside man lang yung edges ng hem (see pic). For the price I paid though, pwede na din. Pero I would gladly pay a bit more price, if only to get a much more "pulido" na tahi. That said, I am not sure how long it will take bago matastas ang hems, hence the 4 stars.
